Session 18 - 11/10/2025

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Pregame info
  • Orbs? Acting as a McGuffin. Something to go get for the story to keep going. The Prim AKA Magic of the world was starting to fade and to try to capture it, Lud tried to build machinery wells while Marelyn tried to take the essences and c...
  • Do we have time to catch up to OYK? Yes..
  • Karla takes the necklace back from Bart (with 12-13 dudes with farm equipment and the muscle backing her up).
  • Chad is told to return the championship belt. He runs with the belt but they yell after that he does NOT have the title of Champion even if he keeps the belt.
  • Moon should be full, but it’s not shining as the moon goddess is upset at Kiv.
  • We are banished from Argentown and will be met with force if we ever return.
  • We killed our mushroom buyer so the mushroom trade will not happen now.
  • Ponzi is apparently gone too after stealing all the magic items from the Baron.
  • Only Oz can come and go as he pleases with Argentown and after not being happy we saved his life and not successfully guiding us in our journey, decides to also not try to help us at all and stays in town.
  • Lilyblossum has also abandoned us. Everyone hates us. We’re depressed.
  • We go to a bar outside of Argentown with a knockoff movie and start drinking.
